CustomField.description: Combines Ticket header fields for use on reporting.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/"&Id, Name) & BR()& Title__c& BR()&BR()& "Assignee: "& Assignee__r.FirstName&" "&Assignee__r.LastName & BR()& "Requested by: "&Requested_By__r.FirstName&" "&Requested_By__r.LastName
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Combines Ticket header fields for use on reporting.
CustomField.label: Ticket Header
